name: KidneyBiopsy
title: Kidney Biopsy
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains procedure terms representing kidney biopsy procedures.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who had a kidney (renal) biopsy.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes terms that represent kidney biopsy.),(Exclusion Criteria: Does not include any codes or concepts which do not represent kidney biopsy(s) as defined in the inclusion criteria.)
